faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about AI Fitness Trainer

items.question: What makes these workout videos special?
items.answer: Each video is custom-created based on your environment and available objects. Our AI analyzes your photo and creates personalized exercises that you can do with everyday items around you.

items.question: How long does it take to receive the video?
items.answer: Your personalized workout video is generated in just 2-5 minutes. We use advanced AI technology to create your custom workout quickly while ensuring exercise safety and effectiveness.

items.question: What objects can I use for workouts?
items.answer: Almost anything! Water bottles, chairs, towels, backpacks, stairs, walls - our AI can create effective exercises using common household items. Just take a photo of your space.

items.question: Is this suitable for beginners?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our AI creates workouts tailored to all fitness levels. You can specify your experience level and any limitations, and we'll generate appropriate exercises.

items.question: Can I target specific muscle groups?
items.answer: Yes! You can choose to focus on chest, arms, legs, core, back, or full body workouts. The AI will create exercises targeting your selected muscle groups.

items.question: What if generation fails?
items.answer: If your video fails to generate due to a technical issue, you will not lose any credits. We automatically refund your credits, and you can try again immediately.

cta.title: Object2Workout, for I am with you
cta.description: Create your personalized Bible video today and experience God's peace

quote.text: Object2Workout, for I am with you; be not dismayed, for I am your God.
